inclusion.label: met

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: admitted earlier today evaluation of syncope and ventricular arrhythmias

inclusion.criterion: previous positive tilt table test (TTT) with a cardioinhibitory or mixed response

inclusion.criterion: syncopes occurring during TTT are not taken into account
